message: Initialize v8.6.0
Suppress "feature file" from the infos_html  as it is replaced by the "topics".
Feature was not completely removed from makefile
Again update of v67mbpt#52 for portability
Minor improvements in input file
Do not mention the frequency of occurrence in case of internal_only variable.
Suppress many unused variables
Merge branch 'release-8.6.0' of gitlab.abinit.org:trunk/abinit into release-8.6.0
Correct type initialisations  to avoid compiler error messages
Fix compile problems.
Format modif to please the compiler
Adjust tolerance (large !) for v6#94   also eliminate unused variable
Merge branch 'release-8.6.0' of gitlab:trunk/abinit into release-8.6.0
Introduce new input variable chkdilatmx.
Document the new input variable chkdilatmx. Should still make at least one test ...
Fix the declrataion and innder document of chkdilatmx
Fix gub (endif missing)
Define message
Change ALL http:// by https://www.abinit.org
remove some unicode characters
Fix problems with the doc of chkdilatmx  and ROBODOC.
Set up new datasets in test v3#42  to test the new input variable chkdilatmx  and also corrected treatment of violations of chkdilatmx constraint.
Correct the numbering in the "installation notes" for v8.4 and 8.6.
Update ref for v3#42  from abiref machine
Merge branch 'chkdilatmx' into release-8.6.0
Exclude tests 93 & 94 from executing on buda_intel_14.0_mpich (was already excluded from intel_13.0)
Update ref v3#42  for missing "s"
Upgrade Abivars.jar : much better help.
Apply generate_doc.py
Start the finalization of ABINITv8.6.0
Apply generate_doc.py
Rerun generate_doc: lots of chages because dict ordering is not guaranteed
Include latex equations
Replace png with latex  use svg because it's 2017  24Mb --> 8Mb
Use wikilink and bibtex entries for citations
And now chmod ugo-x for several py modules because only scripts need x bit-flag
Regenerate doc  on the basis of Matteo's modifications for theory BSE and MBPT (latex + mathjax)
Fix references in the abiref.bib file
Fix anchor problem in bib_acknow.htm
Start to work on the release_notes

Upgrade check list

Update contributor file
